boardgame.name: Arctic Scavengers
Scavengers
boardgame.description: In the year 2097, the entire Earth was enveloped in a cataclysmic shift in climate, plunging the globe into another ice age. Nearly 90% of the world_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s population was eliminated, driving the survivors to band together into loose communities and tribes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Arctic Scavengers, you are the leader of a small tribe of survivors. Resources, tools, medicine, and mercenaries are all in scarce supply. You and your tribe are pitted against up to four other tribes in a fight for survival. Build up your tribe, skirmish against other players head-to-head, or even bluff your way to victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player with the largest tribe at the end of the game is declared the winner!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: MN 0083 Arctic Scavengers with HQ and Recon

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Cards in good condition. Box is a bit banged up but this is normal as they used a very cheap box for this homemade version. I love the game but my gaming group does not play drafting games any more, so it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s better if it goes to someone who will play this. Accepted payment: Paypal, CoolStuff or Amazon gift certificate. Shipping costs: 10$ worldwide for regular parcel. 30$ for UPS/DHL/Fedex. If it costs more, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll cover the difference. If less, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll give it back :)

Driftwood games, first edition. Excellent condition. Cards are sleeved and have no wear. The box sides are in great condition. The tuckbox top and bottom have significant creasing, which is usual for this edition. Both top and bottom have tape residue and a small part of the bottom has been pulled off with the tape. I could send pictures if you like. Over all, the box is in great shape. No structural issues. Within the US, I ship via Fedex, with insurance and tracking (shipping to an office location should cost around $8). Outside the US, I will ship via USPS, probably the easiest to use. I will charge the exact amount I pay for shipping, no extras. Check out my other games for sale. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to combine shipping.
The box is a bit damaged because the publisher used very cheaply-made boxes for the printing. Nevertheless, the game components are all in fantastic condition.
